com.palomamobile.android.sdk.user

Interface IUserManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IServiceManager<IUserService>, IUserCredentialsProvider

    public interface IUserManager
extends IUserCredentialsProvider, IServiceManager<IUserService>
    Methods in this interface provide convenient job creation methods that provide easy access to the underlying IUserService functionality. App developers can either use BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob job instances returned by the createJob...() methods, or create custom jobs that invoke methods of the IUserService returned by IServiceManager.getService()
    To get a concrete implementation of this interface call ServiceSupport.Instance.getServiceManager(IUserManager.class)

      • createJobRegisterUser

        JobRegisterUser createJobRegisterUser(IUserCredential userCredential)
        Async request to register a user using the provided IUserCredential. Credential can represent a new user for sign-up or an existing user for login.
        For convenience use either createJobRegisterUserViaFacebook(String, String) or createJobRegisterUserViaPassword(String, String) When a response is received an EventLocalUserUpdated is published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus().
        Parameters:
        userCredential -

      • createJobLoginUser

        JobLoginUser createJobLoginUser(IUserCredential userCredential)
        Async request to login and existing user using the provided IUserCredential. Credential can only represent an existing user for login or the call results in an throwable.
        For convenience use either createJobLoginUserViaFacebook(String, String) or createJobLoginUserViaPassword(String, String) When a response is received an EventLocalUserUpdated is published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus().
        Parameters:
        userCredential -
        Returns:
